page_info_list.Title: #01 - A Quiet Night
page_info_list.Alt text: Hello, dear. I hope you've settled in. We're about to begin.

page_info_list.Title: #02 - Envelopes on Bridges
page_info_list.Alt text: I must say, I do love setting a scene properly.

page_info_list.Title: #03 - Alone, alone, alone
page_info_list.Alt text: Bridges are often said to be portals to...other places.

page_info_list.Title: #04 - A New Appearance
page_info_list.Alt text: If I were her, I'd be delighted I have someplace to sit other than the floor.

page_info_list.Title: #06 - Job Posting
page_info_list.Alt text: Graphic design is clearly not this hotel's forté.

page_info_list.Title: #09 - A Quick Call
page_info_list.Alt text: He didn't even say goodbye! How rude. I taught him better than that.
